reviews.review: Great aesthetic. Hoodie, headphones, lights off.

The original, it's good, but I wouldn't recommend it. Why? Left 4 Dead 2 is just so much better - more weapons etc. - Just skip this and buy Left 4 Dead 2 with all the DLC. You get L4D campaigns in it anyway with improved AI, weapons..

好游戏啊，我终于入正了

Left 4 Dead is a classic game that's so good to play. It's a surprise the game is not dead even after so many years. The campaign and characters are great and the atmosphere sets the tone for the game. There are multiple game modes and it's really fun and a great time killer. It's important to know that Left 4 Dead 2 includes the Left 4 Dead campaign so you might as well go get that. But still this is a game worth your time and money.
My first steam game and boy was it the greatest
Excelente juego por si no tienes una PC de buenos componentes

Первая left 4 dead рекомендуется чисто для коллекции или если вам охотно посмотреть на различия между первой и второй части. А так не рекомендую, так как все главы из первой части были добавлены во вторую часть
While the original has its fans and not without its own merits, I would recommend Left 4 Dead 2 instead of this as it has almost all of the content found in this game, minus a special map or two.
great game but we want left 4 dead 3

求生之路2延用了很多1的地图，和朋友玩通了2之后，一个人再来打1就轻松多了。虽然画质有马赛克风，但毕竟是很多年前的作品了，放到当时也算是佳作。好评！好心情游戏~

Great game!  Tons of fun in a group.  32 bit only so don't update your Mac or PC to a version that only supports 64 bit.  Cross platform works on Mac and PC.
Polecam każdemu w tych ciężkich czasach. Tytuł idealny na kwarantannę. Uczy i bawi, bawi i uczy.

The game plays well, has a good enough story and characters to keep players interested, and the different types of infected spice up the gameplay and keep it interesting, especially during the parts where the hordes in play. The system of finding dead teammates and bringing them back after death is also interesting. The maps never feel linear, like they're pushing you in one direction like other games. There are some miner graphical issues I found, nothing to do with the quality, in fact it still looks good for a 12 year old game. I'd rate it a 9.8/10, and say I hope Valve are working on Left For Dead 3 after Half-Life Alyx.
Was the best game a bit too much hacking these days it discourage new players, valv should patch bhop scripting and bug kicking etc and add a new map, could be a big hit again
Good game but I wish there was mods for it and not just the second one
This game is awesome 10/10 I lobed playing on the xbox now its even better on pc

Um jogo de Zumbi ao melhor estilo CS GO, o que poderia dar errado? Este jogo é a prova de que a simplicidade pode criar um grande jogo. Com uma premissa simples Left 4 Dead é um excelente jogo para jogar com amigos e se borrar de medo cada vez que ouvir o choro de uma Witch perdida no meio do mapa!

Not my cup of tea. Bought it for single player experience (as it was also tagged as such) and expected a decent shooter with a bit of a story behind it but found it frustrating, irritating, illogical and storyless. 
Steroid zombies coming out from nowhere in a small room you just cleared !?
It was quickly decomposed from my HD...

Puta que me gusta este juego, todavia recuerdo cuando lo jugaba trucho y ponia ahi 15 tanques para que me rompieran el ano, que buenos tiempos conshesumare, gracias gabe newell por dejarlo free y sacarlo 3 días antes que pudiera registrarlo ya que en esos tiempos mi internet era de 42 kbps, GRACIAS GUATON CULIAO, ME HICISTE GASTAR PLATA CHANCHO CONSHETUMARE
